en: you yourself (emphatic subject pronoun, second person singular)

ngiemboon: Kwàʼ gù zɔ ge gʉa ntse.
en: You yourself are going to go into the water.

ngiemboon: À tyé ncwò ndá ne ḿbúʼte kwáʼ kwáʼ.
en: He is knocking on the door.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ gÿǒ kwàʼ mboŋó na mèŋ.
en: You did something magnificent to me.
I myself (emphatic subject pronoun, first person singular)

ngiemboon: À gɔ̌ɔn ngie kwàʼ mèŋ tó.
en: He said let me come myself.
we ourselves (emphatic subject pronoun, first person plural exclusive)

ngiemboon: Kwàʼ peg zɔ ge gʉa ntse.
en: We ourselves (without you), are going to go into the water.
we ourselves (emphatic subject pronoun, first person plural inclusive)

ngiemboon: Kwàʼ pege zɔ ge gʉa ntse.
en: We ourselves (with you) are going to go into the water.
you yourselves (emphatic subject pronoun, second person plural)

ngiemboon: Kwàʼ pi zɔ ge gʉa ntse.

en: they themselves (emphatic subject pronoun, third person plural)

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ne ńzẅíʼte ngie kwàʼ pɔ́b tó ńzɛ́te wɔ́ɔn.
en: I'm waiting for them to come and ask me.
he himself (emphatic subject pronoun, third person singular)

ngiemboon: Kwàʼ yé zɔ ge gʉa ntse.
en: He himself is going to go into the water.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gyǎ tsɔ̌ kwé nê kùʼu lɔ̌ɔn pɔ̀ɔn á gaʼte nzyè.
en: I saw a miser, he was crying famine.
